what: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
text: goal capesData provide attractive dataset exploring visualizing data International Mobility Programs funded CAPES/Brazil. CAPES database refers international mobility programs period 2010 2019.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
text: can install development version capesData GitHub :

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
text: Data collected CAPES/Brazil (Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior) https://dadosabertos.capes.gov.br/dataset/, referring international mobility programs 2010 2019 funded CAPES/Brazil. capesData package contains two datasets. also load tidyverse package pretty printing tibbles code examples. One called capesData, simplified version raw data; see ?capesData info: second dataset capesData_raw, contains variables original names downloaded; see ?capesData_raw info.
code: library(capesData) library(tidyverse) capesData #> # A tibble: 146,036 × 14 #>    ID_PROCESSO NM_NIVEL AN_INICIO ME_INICIO AN_FIM ME_FIM NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCI…¹ #>    <chr>       <chr>        <dbl> <chr>      <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                  #>  1 3038-11-4   GRADUAÇ…      2011 08          2012 05     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  2 3038-11-4   GRADUAÇ…      2011 08          2012 05     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  3 402509      DOUTORA…      2007 04          2011 03     PONTIFÍCIA UNIVERSIDA… #>  4 1091272     DOUTORA…      2012 03          2015 02     UNIVERSIDADE DE BRASÍ… #>  5 623546      MESTRAD…      2009 12          2010 05     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  6 0963-10-0   ESTÁGIO…      2010 05          2010 07     UNIVERSIDADE DE SÃO P… #>  7 9904-11-5   DOUTORA…      2012 05          2013 04     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  8 9904-11-5   DOUTORA…      2012 05          2013 04     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  9 9202-12-9   DOUTORA…      2012 09          2013 04     UNIVERSIDADE DE BRASÍ… #> 10 948932      DOUTORA…      2011 04          2011 09     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #> # ℹ 146,026 more rows #> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCIPAL_DA #> # ℹ 7 more variables: NM_UF_IES_ORIGEM <chr>, NM_IES_ESTUDO_PRINCIPAL_DA <chr>, #> #   NM_PAIS_IES_ESTUDO <chr>, NM_GRANDE_AREA <chr>, NM_AREA_CONHECIMENTO <chr>, #> #   NM_AREA_AVALIACAO <chr>, NM_PROGRAMA <chr> capesData_raw #> # A tibble: 146,036 × 51 #>    ID_PROCESSO NM_NIVEL AN_INICIO ME_INICIO AN_FIM ME_FIM NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCI…¹ #>    <chr>       <chr>        <dbl> <chr>      <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                  #>  1 3038-11-4   GRADUAÇ…      2011 08          2012 05     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  2 3038-11-4   GRADUAÇ…      2011 08          2012 05     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  3 402509      DOUTORA…      2007 04          2011 03     PONTIFÍCIA UNIVERSIDA… #>  4 1091272     DOUTORA…      2012 03          2015 02     UNIVERSIDADE DE BRASÍ… #>  5 623546      MESTRAD…      2009 12          2010 05     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  6 0963-10-0   ESTÁGIO…      2010 05          2010 07     UNIVERSIDADE DE SÃO P… #>  7 9904-11-5   DOUTORA…      2012 05          2013 04     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  8 9904-11-5   DOUTORA…      2012 05          2013 04     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #>  9 9202-12-9   DOUTORA…      2012 09          2013 04     UNIVERSIDADE DE BRASÍ… #> 10 948932      DOUTORA…      2011 04          2011 09     UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL … #> # ℹ 146,026 more rows #> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCIPAL_DA #> # ℹ 44 more variables: NM_UF_IES_ORIGEM <chr>, #> #   NM_IES_ESTUDO_PRINCIPAL_DA <chr>, NM_PAIS_IES_ESTUDO <chr>, #> #   NM_GRANDE_AREA <chr>, NM_AREA_CONHECIMENTO <chr>, NM_AREA_AVALIACAO <chr>, #> # title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
code: capesData |>   count(NM_NIVEL) #> # A tibble: 44 × 2 #>    NM_NIVEL                                       n #>    <chr>                                      <int> #>  1 APERFEIÇOAMENTO                               25 #>  2 APRIMORAMENTO                                  1 #>  3 ARTICULADOR PEDAGÓGICO                         6 #>  4 CAPACITAÇÃO                                   56 #>  5 CAPACITAÇÃO PROFESSORES DA EDUCAÇÃO BÁSICA   783 #>  6 CÁTEDRA                                       31 #>  7 CÁTEDRA  HARVARD                               1 #>  8 CÁTEDRA ESTADOS UNIDOS                         5 #>  9 CÁTEDRA EUROPA                                21 #> 10 DOUTOR JÚNIOR                                 31 #> # ℹ 34 more rows  capesData |>   count(NM_GRANDE_AREA) #> # A tibble: 10 × 2 #>    NM_GRANDE_AREA                  n #>    <chr>                       <int> #>  1 CIÊNCIAS AGRÁRIAS           12228 #>  2 CIÊNCIAS BIOLÓGICAS          9427 #>  3 CIÊNCIAS DA SAÚDE           12889 #>  4 CIÊNCIAS EXATAS E DA TERRA  17367 #>  5 CIÊNCIAS HUMANAS            17274 #>  6 CIÊNCIAS SOCIAIS APLICADAS  13513 #>  7 ENGENHARIAS                 46006 #>  8 LINGÜÍSTICA, LETRAS E ARTES  6052 #>  9 MULTIDISCIPLINAR             6041 #> 10 <NA>                         5239

what: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
text: goal capesData provide attractive dataset exploring visualizing data International Mobility Programs funded CAPES/Brazil. CAPES database refers international mobility programs period 2010 2019.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
text: data frame 146036 rows 14 columns: ID_PROCESSO Number concession process. NM_NIVEL Type scholarship. AN_INICIO Year scholarship begins. ME_INICIO Month scholarship begins. AN_FIM End year scholarship. ME_FIM End month scholarship. NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's home institution. NM_UF_IES_ORIGEM Name Federation State beneficiary's institution origin. NM_IES_ESTUDO_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's study institution. NM_PAIS_IES_ESTUDO Country destination beneficiary. NM_GRANDE_AREA Field knowledge. NM_AREA_CONHECIMENTO Area knowledge classified CAPES. NM_AREA_AVALIACAO Area project evaluation. NM_PROGRAMA Program Name.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
text: Created Leonardo Biazoli data provided CAPES/BRAZIL https://dadosabertos.capes.gov.br/dataset/.

what: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData_raw
title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData_raw
text: goal capesData provide attractive dataset exploring visualizing data International Mobility Programs funded CAPES/Brazil. CAPES database refers international mobility programs period 2010 2019.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData_raw
Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData_raw
text: data frame 146036 rows 51 columns: ID_PROCESSO Number concession process. NM_NIVEL Type scholarship. AN_INICIO Year scholarship begins. ME_INICIO Month scholarship begins. AN_FIM End year scholarship. ME_FIM End month scholarship. NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's home institution. NM_UF_IES_ORIGEM Name Federation State beneficiary's institution origin. NM_IES_ESTUDO_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's study institution. NM_PAIS_IES_ESTUDO Country destination beneficiary. NM_GRANDE_AREA Field knowledge. NM_AREA_CONHECIMENTO Area knowledge classified CAPES. NM_AREA_AVALIACAO Area project evaluation. NM_PROGRAMA Program Name. CD_MOEDA Functional payment currency. VL_TOTAL_RECEBIDO_MOEDA Total amount received functional currency. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO Amount received travel assistance. VL_ADICIONAL_LOCALIDADE Amount received locality bonus. VL_ADICIONAL_DEPENDENTE Additional amount paid full doctoral scholarship holders registered dependents. VL_BOLSA Amount received scholarship/fees. VL_TAXA_ESCOLAR Amount received tuition fees. VL_DIF_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO Amount received differences/reimbursements travel expenses performed. VL_DIF_SEGURO_SAUDE Amount received differences/reimbursements expenses performed health insurance. VL_SEGURO_SAUDE Amount received health insurance. VL_TAXA_ESCOLAR_VALOR_P Amount received small tuition fees. VL_OUTROS_CREDITOS Amount received payment extraordinary expenses. VL_DIF_MENSALIDADE Amount received differences/reimbursements expenses performed tuition. VL_OUTROS_DEBITOS Amount received differences/refunds debts. VL_DIF_DEPENDENTES Amount received differences/reimbursements expenses performed additional dependent. VL_MENSALIDADE Amount received stipend. VL_AUX_INSTALACAO Amount received installation aid. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE_ANUAL Amount received annual installments health insurance. VL_MENSALIDADES_AGENDADAS Amount received scheduled tuition. VL_REEMBOLSO_TAXA_ESCOLAR Amount received refund tuition fees paid beneficiary. VL_AUX_MORADIA Amount received housing allowance. VL_DIF_AUX_INSTALACAO Amount received differences/refunds installation aid. VL_REEMBOLSO_PASSAGEM_AEREA Amount received differences/refunds airfare. VL_AUX_MATERIAL_DIDATICO Amount received aid teaching materials, paid Ciencia Sem Fronteiras Program. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE Amount received health insurance benefit. VL_AJUDA_CUSTO_CAPES_SETEC Amount received subsistence allowance, paid CAPES/SETEC program. VL_MENSALIDADE_DEMANDA Amount received monthly fee demand. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO_DEMANDA Amount received travel allowance demand. VL_MENSALIDADE_LIC_MATERNIDADE Amount received tuition maternity leave scholarship holder duration process. VL_ESCOLA_ALTOS_ESTUDOS Amount received scholarship Escola de Altos Estudos program. VL_AJUDA_CUSTO Amount received subsistence allowance. VL_AUX_INSTALACAO_DEPENDENTE Additional amount received installation aid, paid full doctoral scholarship holders registered dependents. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE_DEPENDENTE Additional amount received health insurance aid, paid full doctoral scholarship holders registered dependents. VL_AJUDA_CUSTO_MTUR Amount received subsistence allowance, paid CAPES/MTUR program. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO_RETORNO_D Amount received travel allowance return. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE_DEMANDA Amount received health insurance demand. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO_PESQUISA Amount received travel allowance research.
